actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Illinois River in Oregon as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Illinois River, Oregon, as part of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Illinois River in Oregon as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
